m_szDocTitle: The new Chevrolet Volt is something to get charged up about - LA Times
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- The new Chevrolet Volt is something to get charged up about GM The 2016 Chevrolet Volt features a new body, a new motor and a new battery that give the vehicle more space, more power and greater range. The 2016 Chevrolet Volt features a new body, a new motor and a new battery that give the vehicle more space, more power and greater range. (GM) Charles Fleming Contact Reporter The world's bestselling plug-in electric hybrid just got a little better.
